channel.description: Recent content in horus-theme on Asindu's journal

item.title: Horus Theme
item.description: “Try to refresh the site before it’s finished building.. I double dare you. Having nearly instant feedback enables you to have your creativity flow without waiting for long builds.” - Author of hugo I have used several static site generators, from Jekyll to Lektor and now Hugo. As for now, I really like Hugo but couldn’t find a theme that matched my preferred aesthetics & functional tastes. That’s why I made Horus theme.
